metadata.title: CVE-2017-6514 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.description: WordPress 4.7.2 mishandles listings of post authors, which allows remote attackers to obtain sensitive information (Path Disclosure) via a /wp-json/oembed/1.0/embed?url= request, related to the "author_name":" substring.

criterions.comment: wordpress package in hirsute is affected and needs fixing.
